title: FS: Breaking Up a High Grade 1884 Lawson's Patent Baseball Game Set - all SGC Graded
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: Breaking Up a High Grade 1884 Lawson's Patent Baseball Game Set - all SGC Graded
posts.post_content:
Hi - breaking up my SGC-graded 1884 Lawson's Patent Baseball Game set.  There are 36 total cards here.  Back when SGC had a set registry, this was the #1 set on it.  

These cards are 140 years old!  Hard to believe they are still so affordable for such high grades from this era.

Also would consider offers for the full set (which has an average grade of 8.67).

Cards and grades are as seen below.  I can provide better pics of anything you want to see better. Postage included if it's over $100, or else add $4.  Prices by grade are:

SGC 88:  $60
SGC 92:  $80
SGC 96:  $105

3 Strikes SGC 88
3 Strikes Missed SGC 88
3 Strikes Out SGC 88
7 Balls SGC 88  SOLD
Base Hit 1 SGC 80  SOLD
Base Hit 2 SGC 88
Base Hit 3 SGC 88
Baseman 1 SGC 96
Baseman 2 SGC 96  SOLD
Baseman 3 SGC 96
Catcher SGC 96
Fly Ball SGC 96
Fly Catch SGC 96
Fly Muff SGC 96
Forced Out SGC 92
Foul Ball SGC 92
Foul Catch SGC 96
Foul Muff SGC 96
Grounder SGC 88
Home Run SGC 96
Pickup SGC 96
Striker SGC 96 - all 9 copies are SOLD
Umpire SGC 96
Value of Cards Rules Card SGC 88
Wild Throw SGC 96 (There are 5 exact copies of the Wild Throw card, all graded SGC 96, as the original game came with 5 exact copies of the card.  The PSA Set Registry only lists one copy of the card in its set registry.)  1 SOLD, 4 remain

Thanks for looking!
Scott
